channel.title: Anki on harshcurious
channel.description: Recent content in Anki on harshcurious

item.title: Today I Learnt 3
item.description: Arsenal vs Liverpool Oh well, Arsenal suck. Superstore S05E02/E03 Deals with contemporary work related issues in US in a hilarious way. Much better than The Office. Much more diversity and much more realistic. Looks of Webhosting services This freeCodeCamp.org youtube lecture gives a good look of the the website hosting process at this moment in time. Anki There are a huge number of improvements in Anki since I last used it.
